mapper.select: SELECT W.W_NUM, W.M_ID, W.P_NUM,W.T_NUM, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE FROM WISHLIST W INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON W.P_NUM=P.P_NUM WHERE W.M_ID=#{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST (W_NUM, M_ID, P_NUM, T_NUM) VALUES (WISHLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_id}, #{p_num}, #{t_num})
mapper.delete: DELETE WISHLIST WHERE W_NUM =#{w_num} AND M_ID=#{m_id}
